SELECT SEQ, NO, ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, FILE, PRICE, IFNULL(DOWNLOAD_COUNT,0) DOWNLOAD_COUNT, IFNULL(HIT_COUNT,0) HIT_COUNT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID, CATEGORY FROM SIX_PARTNER_BOARD WHERE SEQ = #{seq} AND CATEGORY = #{category}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SIX_PARTNER_BOARD ( NO, ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, FILE, PRICE, CATEGORY, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(NO),0) + 1 FROM SIX_PARTNER_BOARD A WHERE A.ID = #{id} AND A.CATEGORY = #{category}), #{id}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{file}, #{price}, #{category}, now(), #{createId} )
mapper.select: SELECT C.ID, CONVERT(C.RANK, UNSIGNED) RANK, CONVERT(C.CNT, UNSIGNED) CNT, CONVERT(D.DOWNLOAD_RANK, UNSIGNED) DOWNLOAD_RANK, CONVERT(D.DOWNLOAD_COUNT, UNSIGNED) DOWNLOAD_COUNT FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RANK, A.CNT, A.ID FROM ( SELECT COUNT(ID) CNT, ID FROM SIX_PARTNER_BOARD GROUP BY ID ) A, (SELECT @rownum:=0) R ORDER BY CNT DESC ) C, ( SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS DOWNLOAD_RANK, B.DOWNLOAD_COUNT, B.ID FROM ( SELECT SUM(DOWNLOAD_COUNT) DOWNLOAD_COUNT, ID FROM SIX_PARTNER_BOARD GROUP BY ID ) B, (SELECT @RNUM:=0) T ORDER BY B.DOWNLOAD_COUNT DESC ) D WHERE C.ID = D.ID AND C.ID = #{id}
